entry.entryTitle: What are XML namespaces? Why are namespaces used in XML documents?
entry.paragraph:
XML namespaces provide a means for document authors to prevent naming collisions
Each namespace prefix is bound to a uniform resource identifier (URI) that uniquely identifies the namespace

entry.entryTitle: If you have written an XML document, how do you check whether it is valid or not?
entry.paragraph: An XML document that conforms to a schema document is schema valid
